Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconAllowsOverlap
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the icon will be visible even if it collides with other previously drawn symbols.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconIgnoresPlacement
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, other symbols can be visible even if they collide with the icon.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconOptional
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, text will display without their corresponding icons only when the icon collides with other

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconPadding
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The size of the additional area around the icon’s bounding box used for detecting symbol collisions.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconPitchAlignment
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: The orientation of the style annotation’s icon when map is pitched, as defined by MLNIconPitchAlignment.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: iconRotationAlignment
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Determines the rotation behavior of icons, in combination with symbolPlacement as defined by MLNIconRotationAlignment.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Scales the icon to fit around the associated text, as defined by MLNIconTextFit.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: keepsIconUpright

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: keepsTextUpright
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the text may be flipped vertically to prevent it from being rendered upside-down.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: maximumTextAngle
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: Maximum angle change between adjacent characters, measured in degrees.

Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.name: symbolAvoidsEdges
Classes/MLNSymbolAnnotationController.ht.abstract: If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions.
